https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dLNMh56Fjj2zhy4Wq352QzIgnD1.jpg At the beginning of the 50s, a group of men and women from different corners of Europe met casually in Bariloche and began, almost without knowing it, a unique cinematographic movement: the Argentine Mountain Cinema.
